s.text: The Orangemen threatened to call a general strike, and authorities agreed to let them stage another march in Belfast next week.

Eventually the two leaders met and agreed to keep their criticisms private.
The anti-Starr spins: This confirms Starr's public image as a reckless zealot and removes the leverage he had hoped to use to make Hubbell rat on Clinton.
